title: Two officers shot and killed at Bridgewater College in Virginia - CNN
content:
1. Two officers shot and killed at Bridgewater College in Virginia  CNN
  2. WATCH LIVE: Authorities hold a press conference about Bridgewater College's active shooter situation  WSLS 10
  3. Bridgewater College shooting leaves two campus security officers dead; suspect in custody  Fox News
  4. Two officers shot and killed at Bridgewater College, suspect in custody  WHSV
  5. State police: 27-year-old charged with capital murder after fatally shooting 2 Bridgewater College c  WAVY TV 10
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Two campus officers were shot and killed Tuesday during an active shooter situation at Bridgewater College in Virginia, according to college spokesperson Logan Bogert.
